titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the funeral of Sir Willoughby Chamberlain, Kt. who died at his house at Chelsey, Dec. 6 and was interred at the parish church of St. James Garlick Hith, London, Dec. 12, 1697 / by John King, rector of Chelsey.
titleStmt.author: King, John, D.D.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
